verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
For You reign
Magnificently,
Rule victoriously,
And Your power is
Shown throughout
The earth.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And we exclaim,
"Our God is mighty!"
Lift up Your name,
For You are holy.
Sing it again,
All honour and glory -
In adoration
We bow before
Your throne!
